name: 周雅芬
objective: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
schedule:

02/27	U. 6     Eating Well 	Lesson 1 ~ 2
03/05	U. 6 	Eating Well	Lesson 3 ~ 4
03/12	U. 7	Psychology & Personality
03/19	U. 7     Lesson 1 ~ 2
03/26	U. 7     Lesson 3 ~ 4
04/02	U. 8	Enjoying the Arts
04/09	U. 8     Lesson 1 ~ 2
04/15    Joint Exam of English (JEE) 
04/16	Midterm Exam 
04/23    U. 8      Lesson 3 ~ 4 
04/30    U. 9	Living with Computers
05/07	U. 9	Lesson 1 ~ 2
05/14	U. 9	Lesson 3 ~ 4  
05/21	U. 10   Ethics and Values
05/28	U. 10	Lesson 1 ~ 2
06/04	U. 10   Lesson 3 ~ 4  
06/11	Final Exam
06/17     Joint Exam of English (JEE)
scorePolicy:
A.輔導課程成績 
B.各班正規課程成績 = 各班期末考前一週測驗成績*40%+各班平時成績*60%
C.會考測驗成績
E.學期總成績= (A*30%+B*70%)*70%+C*30%

B = Midterm exam 20%  (Listening 40%, Reading/Vocabulary/Grammar 60%)
    Final exam   20%  (As above)
    Oral test & Presentations    20% 
    In Class     40%  (In class participation, attendance, quizzes, etc.)
